attributes.action: Have the spelling of the word 'Sulfur' changed back to 'Sulphur' in the Oxford Dictionary
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I personally this that changing the spelling of 'Sulphur' had no justification in literature or Science terms, and therefore should be changed back to the traditional English way of spelling it, as opposed to the American spelling.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
